name: JSoopix
short_description: JSoopix is a photo-organizing tool written in JavaScript. When the user is running any web browser, up to 3 photos in portrait orientation, or one photo in landscape orientation can be displayed at any given time. Photos and folders are organized in a tree, and each node in the tree can have up to 16 sub-nodes. Bottom-level folders can have up to 15 photos, and those photos can be collected in up to 15 pages, each page having up to 3 photos in portrait orientation. The photos can be stored on the user's hard drive or located on external websites.
